quest.name: Dungeon: An Explorer's Curiosity
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:20001001$ (Entrance: $map:02000183$) Party Size (4 players) Quest possible only on Normal Mode.
$npc:11000782$ at $map:02000183$ said that if he were a few years younger, he would have gone to $map:02000321$ and defeated $npc:23100006$ multiple times already, but is pressuring me to fight $npc:23100006$ instead. Although the pressure is not getting to me, it may still be a challenge worth taking on.

quest.name: Legendary Tale
quest.desc: $npc:11000782$ from $map:02000183$ is attempting to boast to $npc:11001064$, an adventurer on dispatch from the Adventurer's Guild, about an experience at $map:02000353$.

quest.name: Dungeon: An Adventurer's Curiosity
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:20001001$ (Entrance: $map:02000183$) Party Size (4 players) Quest possible only on Normal Mode.
Unwilling to accept an adventurer with no proof of courage, $npc:11001064$ at $map:02000183$ has said to return after gaining a perfect understanding of $npc:23100006$.

quest.name: Courageous & Friendly
quest.desc: $npc:11000136$ of $map:02000051$ spoke about $map:02000325$, where $npc:21800006$, through ancient spirit sorcery, has been directly fighting and judging the skills of challengers through the spirits monsters. Let's go to $map:02000217$ and meet $npc:11000289$ to find out more about $map:02000325$.

quest.name: Dungeon: A New Challenge
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:25000001$ (Entrance: $map:2000217$)
$npc:11000289$ took the challenge at $map:02000325$, but couldn't even pass the first test. He assured me that until he passes all the tests he won't give up, and will continue to train for as long as it takes. He also proposed a bet in regards to whoever can pass the first test at $map:02000325$ and meet $npc:21800006$. If there isn't a good reason to avoid it, then it's not such a bad idea to take up the challenge at $map:02000325$.

quest.name: Dungeon: Brave Spirit
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:25000001$ (Entrance: $map:2000217$)
$npc:11000675$ of $map:02000217$ advised me not to be lazy with training at $map:02000325$. I need to show everybody my spirit is brave and earn their recognition.

quest.name: Warm Encouragement
quest.desc: $npc:11001177$, standing watch at the vigilante guard post at $map:2000057$, couldn't hide their excitement when speaking of $npc:11000015$. $npc:11000015$'s role is to personally check the guard posts near the $map:2000076$ region with the supply corps as a way of encouraging them. Since the guards can't afford to be negligent in their duties, $npcName:11001177$ has requested that I deliver $item:30000412$ to the supply soldier who has gone to $map:2000091$.

quest.name: Dungeon: Enemy Beyond the Palace
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:25003001$ (Entrance: $map:2000091$)
$npc:11000959$ of $map:2000091$ requested my help in protecting the watchtower beyond the palace walls, as wild pigs are after the emergency rations located inside. $npc:11000015$ and the supply corps are doing their best in this emergency situation and need my help. Let's go to $map:02000334$ to defeat the pigs and protect the watchtower!
quest.manual: Defeat the leader of the pig herd at $map:02000334$

quest.name: Dungeon: Revenge Gone Wrong
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:02000334$ (Entrance: $map:2000091$)
$npc:11001178$ is hiding in the lower region of $map:2000091$! He angrily confirmed that $npc:24001205$, the leader of the pigs attacking $map:02000334$, originally escaped from his pig farm and totally ruined the place when it returned to attack on more than one occasion. $npc:11001178$ warned that $npc:24001205$ won't give up until all the rations inside the watchtower are taken. He said that even as he speaks, $npc:24001205$ is probably gathering more pigs in order to cause more chaos. Could $npc:11001178$'s words be true? Would the pigs I assumed were utterly defeated attack the palace walls again? Let's return to $map:02000334$ and check out the situation!
quest.manual: Defeat $npc:24001205$, the leader of the pig herd, at $map:02000334$

quest.name: Strange Ones
quest.desc: In the middle of $map:2000064$ there are some fairly odd people. $map:2000064$ $npc:11000172$ suspects that these unidentified people are the strangers who entered through $map:2000062$ a few days ago. Who are they? Where are they from? Why have they come here? Let's meet the strange people face to face!

quest.name: Well-deserved Me Time
quest.desc: $npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! She says you look exhausted, and suggests you take a spa day and get refreshed! You are feeling pretty tired. Maybe you should take her suggestion? If you are not so lucky as to have a tub or massage chair to utilize in your own home, why not wander into someone else's?
quest.manual: Take a bubble bath in a $item:50400036$ |Wash your feet in a $item:50400091$ |Receive a massage in a $item:50400037$

quest.name: The Idiot Box
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Having heard that watching TV makes you stupid, she asks you for help finding the truth of this myth.
Does TV really make you stupid? You should go find out! What's the worst that could happen?

quest.name: Befriending a Feline
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Spurned by the stray cats of $map:02000064$, she asks you to see if a $item:50400004$ will enhance her chances at feline companionship.
Well, anything for friendship! it looks like it's time to start knocking on doors until you find a house with a $item:50400004$, and a cat to play with.
quest.manual: Play with a cat in a $item:50400004$

quest.name: Raise the Roof
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! She heard there's a house around here decorated like a dance club. She has tasked you with finding one such party-worthy house so she can get her groove on.
Look around for a house with the requested lighting conditions!

quest.name: Master of the Arcade
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! In the hopes of making new friends, she seeks the approval of local video game enthusiasts. $npcName:11001180$ asks you to try out various arcade games and find one that's not too difficult to play, so that she does not embarrass herself.
Time to go on a video game hunt!

quest.name: You've Got it Maid
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! She is considering work as a maid in the hopes of learning more directly about the culture of Victoria Island.
$npcName:11001180$ has tasked you with performing various house chores, and reporting back as to how difficult a task it was. Nobody likes chores, but perhaps you can take one for the team.
Whether in your own house, or helping out at a friends, go take care of some chores!

quest.name: Healthy Habit #2
quest.desc: $npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Noticing the queasy look on your face, she advised you to seek out a toilet for immediate release. Come to think of it, when was the last time you relieved yourself? Perhaps you should take care of business now, before something regretable happens.
quest.manual: Use $item:50400054$ to take care of business

quest.name: The Odiferous Adventurer
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Of particular note, is your profound odor! Perhaps you should take a break from adventuring and spend some time washing up?
At this point, any sink and shower should do.
quest.manual: Use $item:50400053$ to wash your face |Use $item:50400035$ to take a shower

quest.name: Think Cool
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Having heard of a wonderful device known as a "refrigerator," she has asked you to go and see if it works as well at keeping things cold as she has been told.
Find a home with the recommended brand of refrigerator, and pop your head inside!

quest.name: Feel the Burn
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Her latest infatuation is with the world of high-tech exercise equipment. Are these devices really better than exercising the old-fashioned way? Looks like it's up to you to find out!
Go find a $item:50400096$ and test it out!

quest.name: Shed those Pounds
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Her latest infatuation is with the world of high-tech exercise equipment. Are these devices really better than exercising the old-fashioned way? Looks like it's up to you to find out!
Go find a $item:50400098$ and test it out!

quest.name: Cool as a Cucumber
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Having heard of a wonderful device known as a "refrigerator," she has asked you to go and see if it works as well at keeping things cold as she has been told.
Find a home with the recommended brand of refrigerator, and pop your head inside!

quest.name: Ice Cold
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Having heard of a wonderful device known as a "refrigerator," she has asked you to go and see if it works as well at keeping things cold as she has been told.
Find a home with the recommended brand of refrigerator, and pop your head inside!

quest.name: Maximum Freshness
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Having heard of a wonderful device known as a "refrigerator," she has asked you to go and see if it works as well at keeping things cold as she has been told.
Find a home with the recommended brand of refrigerator, and pop your head inside!

quest.name: Stay Frosty
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Having heard of a wonderful device known as a "refrigerator," she has asked you to go and see if it works as well at keeping things cold as she has been told.
Find a home with the recommended brand of refrigerator, and pop your head inside!

quest.name: Solitary Bliss
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating, and what better way to process one's thoughts than while fishing. $npcName:11001180$ suggests you get over your troubles by sitting quietly in a comfortable $item:50400092$ and collecting your thoughts.
Someone around here must have one in their house you can borrow!

quest.name: Practicality vs. Taste
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Of particular interest to her, are the many foods the land has to offer.
Concerned about her diet, $npcName:11001180$ asks you to try $itemPlural:20000014$ on her behalf and tell her how they taste. It's a good thing adventuring burns a lot of calories...
$itemPlural:20000014$ can be found in the vicinity of $map:2000118$.

quest.name: Chewy, Sweet, and Sour
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Of particular interest to her, are the many foods the land has to offer.
Concerned about her diet, $npcName:11001180$ asks you to try $itemPlural:20000015$ on her behalf and tell her how they taste. It's a good thing adventuring burns a lot of calories...
$itemPlural:20000015$ can be found in the vicinity of $map:2000138$.

quest.name: Delicious, Nutritious Medicine
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Of particular interest to her, are the many foods the land has to offer.
Concerned about her diet, $npcName:11001180$ asks you to eat $itemPlural:20000016$ on her behalf and tell her how they taste. It's a good thing adventuring burns a lot of calories...
$itemPlural:20000016$ can be made by digging up $item:20000045$ in the vicinity of $map:2000146$ and tossing it in a blender at $map:2000026$.

quest.name: Abuzz About Sweets
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Of particular interest to her, are the many foods the land has to offer.
Concerned about her diet, $npcName:11001180$ asks you to try $itemPlural:20000043$ on her behalf and tell her how they taste. It's a good thing adventuring burns a lot of calories...
$itemPlural:20000043$ can be found in the vicinity of $map:2000117$.

quest.name: Slurp 'n' Crunch
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Of particular interest to her, are the many foods the land has to offer.
Concerned about her diet, $npcName:11001180$ asks you to try $itemPlural:20000044$ on her behalf and tell her how they taste. It's a good thing adventuring burns a lot of calories...
$itemPlural:20000044$ can be found in the vicinity of $map:2000059$.

quest.name: A Funny Taste
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Of particular interest to her, are the many foods the land has to offer.
Concerned about her diet, $npcName:11001180$ asks you to try $itemPlural:20000046$ on her behalf and tell her how they taste. It's a good thing adventuring burns a lot of calories...
$itemPlural:20000046$ can be found in the Barrota cargo container at $map:2000139$.

quest.name: Taste the Abyss
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Of particular interest to her, are the many foods the land has to offer.
Concerned about her diet, $npcName:11001180$ asks you to try $itemPlural:20000047$ on her behalf and tell her how they taste. It's a good thing adventuring burns a lot of calories...
$itemPlural:20000047$ can be found in the vicinity of $map:2000146$.

quest.name: The Technical Definition of Food
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Of particular interest to her, are the many foods the land has to offer.
Concerned about her diet, $npcName:11001180$ asks you to try $itemPlural:20000050$ on her behalf and tell her how they taste. It's a good thing adventuring burns a lot of calories...
$itemPlural:20000050$ can be found in the vicinity of $map:2000134$.

quest.name: Salad, Deconstructed
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Of particular interest to her, are the many foods the land has to offer.
Concerned about her diet, $npcName:11001180$ asks you to try $itemPlural:20000052$ on her behalf and tell her how they taste. It's a good thing adventuring burns a lot of calories...
$itemPlural:20000052$ can be found in the vicinity of $map:2000024$.

quest.name: Squishy, Healthy, Prodigiously Gross
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Of particular interest to her, are the many foods the land has to offer.
Concerned about her diet, $npcName:11001180$ asks you to try $itemPlural:20000053$ on her behalf and tell her how they taste. It's a good thing adventuring burns a lot of calories...
$itemPlural:20000053$ can be found in the vicinity of $map:2000052$.

quest.name: Say Aah!
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Of particular interest to her, are the many foods the land has to offer.
Concerned about her diet, $npcName:11001180$ asks you to try $itemPlural:20000054$ on her behalf and tell her how they taste. Maybe you should sit this one out...
$itemPlural:20000054$ can be found at the Ant Tunnel.

quest.name: Too Chewy
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Of particular interest to her, are the many foods the land has to offer.
Concerned about her diet, $npcName:11001180$ asks you to try $itemPlural:20000055$ on her behalf and tell her how they taste. It's a good thing adventuring burns a lot of calories...
$itemPlural:20000055$ can be found in the vicinity of $map:2000017$.

quest.name: Dewy Detox
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Of particular interest to her, are the many foods the land has to offer.
Concerned about her diet, $npcName:11001180$ asks you to try $itemPlural:20000060$ on her behalf and tell her how they taste. It's a good thing adventuring burns a lot of calories...
$itemPlural:20000060$ can be found in the vicinity of $map:2000043$.

quest.name: Stress Test
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Having witnessed people all over the globe smashing various objects to relieve stress, she suggests that such acts of destruction can offer the same benefits for you!
Go forth and break stuff, in the name of stress relief!

quest.name: Earn Your Wings
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Rumor has it, that if you free a fellow adventurer from under a tombstone, you can grow a pair of heavenly wings!
There's nothing wrong with doing a good deed in the name of wicked cool accessories!
quest.manual: Break other people's tombstones to save them from the clutches of death

quest.name: Greetings from Tria
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Secretly worried that you have no friends, she demands that you go and greet people in $map:2000001$.
Time to make some new friends, or die trying!

quest.name: Hello, Henesys!
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Secretly worried that you have no friends, she demands that you go and greet people in $map:2000076$.
Time to make some new friends, or die trying!

quest.name: Eyy, Ellinia!
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Secretly worried that you have no friends, she demands that you go and greet people in $map:2000023$.
Time to make some new friends, or die trying!

quest.name: Howdy, Perion!
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Secretly worried that you have no friends, she demands that you go and greet people in $map:2000051$.
Time to make some new friends, or die trying!

quest.name: Keep it Real, Kerning City!
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Secretly worried that you have no friends, she demands that you go and greet people in $map:2000100$.
Time to make some new friends, or die trying!

quest.name: Take Care, Taliskar!
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Secretly worried that you have no friends, she demands that you go and greet people in $map:2000270$.
Time to make some new friends, or die trying!

quest.name: A Lazy Day Inn
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! For example, it's home to $map:2000033$, a cozy little spot to put your feet up and relax.
$npc:11001180$ says you should swing by, sit down, and take a load off. Why not? You can't spend every moment of the day saving the world.
quest.manual: Sit and relax at $map:2000033$ for 300 seconds

quest.name: A Wonderful Vacation
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Sensing your growing weariness, she tells you to take a vacation at $map:2000171$ in $map:2000178$, one of the finest resorts Maple World has to offer.
It's been a while since you took a break from smacking monsters and saving villages, what could a little vacation hurt?
quest.manual: Sit and relax at $map:2000178$ for 300 seconds

quest.name: Adventures in Literacy: A Griffin's Adventure
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Having heard great things about the best-selling book "$item:39000001$," she asks you to procure her a copy.
It sounds like such a sweet story. You should begin your book-search at $map:2000031$!

quest.name: Reduce, Reuse, Dismantle
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! She suggests you dismantle any unneeded equipment to receive various useful materials.
No sense letting that hideous outfit from 10 levels ago clog up your inventory! Obliterate it into scraps, and pretend it never existed!

quest.name: An Eventful Day
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Having heard about the exciting events put on by the famous $npc:11000168$ has pressured you into participating.
She hasn't specified which... $map:61000002$, $map:61000001$, $map:61000006$, any of his events should do. Pick one, and go for first place!

quest.name: Furry-tailed Friends
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating, but above all she treasures friendship. As one of her friends, it would mean the world to $npcName:11001180$ if you got along with her oldest friend in Victoria Island, $npcName:11000711$.
$npcName:11000711$ can be found near the taxi stop in $map:02000064$. Stop by and say hello!

quest.name: Dancing in the Dirt
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Having heard rumors of mysteriously quaking patches of earth in $map:02000118$ she has asked you to investigate.
Well, you'd better drop everything to go stare at the dirt near $npc:11001310$ in $map:02000118$ for signs of movement.
quest.manual: Locate and investigate the shaking earth in $map:02000118$

quest.name: Adventures in Literacy: Home Decor Trends
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Eager to read something titled "$item:39000015$," but with no idea where to find it, she has once again tasked you with something any reasonably person would take care of themselves: book-shopping.
You should start your search at $map:2000031$!

quest.name: Adventures in Literacy: All About That Bed
quest.desc: $npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! She wants to read $item:39000016$, and has tasked you with tracking down a copy. You should begin your search at $map:2000031$!

quest.name: Adventures in Literacy: Home, Sweet Home
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Eager to read something titled "$item:39000017$," but with no idea where to find it, she has once again tasked you with something any reasonably person would take care of themselves: book-shopping.
You should start your search at $map:2000031$!

quest.name: Adventures in Literacy: Urban Home Trends
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Eager to read something titled "$item:39000018$," but with no idea where to find it, she has once again tasked you with something any reasonably person would take care of themselves: book-shopping.
You should start your search at $map:2000031$!

quest.name: Adventures in Literacy: The Perion Aesthetic
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Eager to read something titled "$item:39000019$," but with no idea where to find it, she has once again tasked you with something any reasonably person would take care of themselves: book-shopping.
You should start your search at $map:2000031$!

quest.name: Adventures in Literacy: Pretty as a Peach
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Eager to read something titled "$item:39000030$," but with no idea where to find it, she has once again tasked you with something any reasonably person would take care of themselves: book-shopping.
You should start your search at $map:2000031$!

quest.name: Adventures in Literacy: Luscious Locks
quest.desc: $npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! She wants to read $item:39000014$, and has tasked you with tracking down a copy. You should begin your search at $map:2000031$!

quest.name: Adventures in Literacy: Block by Block
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! She wants to read a magazine called "$item:39000020$", but doesn't know where to find it.
For something this specialized, you should try searching $npc:11000252$'s bed at the $map:2000158$!

quest.name: Adventures in Literacy: Wild Rides
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! After becoming curious about automobiles, she has asked you to track down a copy of "$item:39000007$" on her behalf.
You should try talking with $npc:11000325$ at $map:2000001$.

quest.name: Adventures in Literacy: Behind Bars
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Eager to learn more about prison, she asks you to bring her a copy of "$item:39000009$."
You should talk to the guards at $map:2000124$!

quest.name: 어둠의 경고
quest.desc: $map:2000023$의 $npc:11000031$$pp:는,은$ 오래 전 어둠의 씨앗에서 자라난 어둠의 줄기가 $map:2000023$$pp:를,을$ 휘감고 돌며 죽음으로 이끌었던 일을 이야기 해 주며 최근 그때와 같은 어둠의 힘이 느껴지고 있다고 말한다. 어딘가에서 어둠의 씨앗이 싹을 틔우고 뿌리를 내린 걸까…? 일단, 깊은 어둠을 품고 어둠의 땅에서 그림자 문을 통해 넘어온 하비 몬스터들을 처치하고 세계를 위협하는 어둠의 기운을 걷어낼 수 있도록 힘을 보태는 것이 좋겠다. $map:2000023$에서 하비꽃을 수집하며 정화의 요정들을 돕고 있는 $npcName:11000037$$pp:를,을$ 만나보자.

quest.name: Before Darkness Blooms
quest.desc: $npcName:11000037$ of $map:2000023$ has spoken of the Havi monsters lurking around the shadow doors at Victoria Island. The $item:30000435$, carrying a powerful dark energy, provide the Havi monsters the ability to linger past death as $item:30000435$ survives to bare fruit. Let's defeat the powerful Havi monsters lurking around the shadow doors. They may be carrying $item:30000435$. I must collect it.
quest.manual: Defeat monsters of level 26 and above near the shadow door and collect $item:30000435$

quest.name: Darkness Returned
quest.desc: $map:2000350$ is a branch of the giant darkness that has been discovered in $map:2000048$, and $npc:11000031$ of $map:2000023$ has requested assistance in uprooting it. Let's meet $npc:11001228$ in $map:2000048$.

quest.name: Dungeon: A Meaningful First Challenge
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:25008001$ (Entrance: $map:2000048$)
$npc:11001228$, who I came across at the entrance of $map:2000350$ of $map:2000048$, has explained that $map:2000350$ is a branch grown from the Seed of Darkness, and that it functions as a conduit for which darkness spreads. Though not an easy task, everyone must work together to fight this giant darkness, otherwise the world will belong to the Demon King. In order to fill the world's darkness with light, we must be brave and push onward.
quest.manual: Remove the first darkness at $map:2000350$ and pass

quest.name: [Dungeon] Attacking the Darkness
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:25008001$ (Entrance: $map:2000048$)
$npcName:11001241$ is unable to fulfill her duty of purifying the $map:2000350$ due to Havi poisoning. She doesn't think you have what it takes to do her job, and challenges you to survivng ten waves in the $map:2000350$.

quest.name: Flying Blind
quest.desc: $npcName:11000407$, who lives in $map:2000306$ of $map:2000133$, heard that some vagabond in the Land of Darkness saw $npcName:11000064$ in $map:3000103$, and has requested confirmation. I can get to the Land of Darkness's $map:3000103$ through the shadow door in $map:2000146$.
quest.complete: Go to $map:3000103$ the in Land of Darkness and find $npcName:11000064$

quest.name: Dungeon: Birth of the Demon
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:21013001$ (Entrance: $map:3000103$) Party Size (4 players) Quest possible only on Normal Mode.
$npc:11001238$, protector of the Land of Darkness's $map:3000103$, recalls seeing $npcName:11000064$ jump into $map:2000349$. Is $npcName:11000064$ safe? I should hurry inside $map:2000349$ and look for $npcName:11000064$...

quest.name: Reckless Life
quest.desc: After hearing what happened in $map:2000349$, $npcName:11000407$ of $map:2000306$ requested I go to $map:2000228$ at $map:2000146$, take $item:30000434$ to treat $npcName:11000064$'s injury, and then ask him why he went to $map:2000349$ alone.

quest.name: Forbidden Adventure
quest.desc:
The Boroboro Fairy $npcName:11001239$ is shaking in terror on one side of $map:2000103$! Out of curiosity, she and other $map:2000023$ Fairies defied the chief's orders and left the village on an adventure to the Land of Darkness. During their journey, they came face-to-face with the witch who protects $map:3000103$, but she was the only one who managed to escape. She wants her friends delivered from $map:3000103$... Let's get to $map:3000103$ in the Land of Darkness and search for the Fairies with $npcName:11001239$.
At $map:3000103$ exists the Land of Darkness, which is connected to the $map:2000146$ shadow door.

quest.name: Dungeon: Tricky Witch
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:21013001$ (Entrance: $map:3000103$) Party Size (4 players) Quest possible only on Normal Mode.
$npcName:11001238$ in $map:3000103$ is smiling slyly, having lied to $npcName:11001239$ and the other Fairies about being able to find a shortcut home if they jumped into $map:2000349$. Let's go into $map:2000349$ and save the Fairies before their souls are devoured by darkness.
quest.manual: Save all the Fairies at $map:2000349$ in the Land of Darkness's $map:3000103$
quest.complete: Meet $npcName:11001238$ at the Land of Darkness's $map:3000103$

quest.name: Dungeon: Curious Witch
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:21013001$ (Entrance: $map:3000103$) Party Size (4 players) Quest possible only on Normal Mode.
$npcName:11001238$ of $map:3000103$ says if I find out who the Demon King's new son born in $map:2000349$ is, she will give me a valuable treasure chest. Although I am curious about the witch's treasure chest, finding out about the Demon King's new son is a challenge worth doing whether anything comes from it or not.
quest.manual: Defeat the Demon King's son at $map:2000349$ in the Land of Darkness's $map:3000103$
quest.complete: Meet $npcName:11001238$ at the Land of Darkness's $map:3000103$

quest.name: Where Is He?
quest.desc: $npcName:11001274$ is waiting in the grassy field behind the taxi stop at $map:2000064$! Seems as though he is waiting on Bomar, a member of the Arikari Merchant Society... Where is Bomar, anyway? Shouldn't there be someone in the Arikari Merchant Society, located in $map:2000064$, who may know his whereabouts?

quest.name: Best Buds
quest.desc: $npcName:11001180$, who has been looking around $map:2000064$ excitedly, is now reminiscing and listening to stories of his homeland, Karkara Island. Unfortunately, there hasn't been any news of Bomar... Could $npcName:11001181$, Bomar's closest friend within the Arikari Merchant Society, know of his whereabouts? Let's go see!

quest.name: Secret Message
quest.desc: $npcName:11001181$ revealed that Bomar left a letter asking for the care of $npcName:11001274$ until he returned. The letter was delivered by $npcName:11000994$, who is in charge of all the minor chores in $map:2000062$. $npcName:11001181$ says I should ask $npcName:11000994$, for he may know of Bomar's whereabouts.

quest.name: Back to Home!
quest.desc: $npcName:11000994$ of $map:2000062$ said that Bomar went on a boat to $map:2000183$ with $npc:11001276$. $map:2000183$… Why would Bomar go all the way there with the inventors? Going to $map:2000183$ to find Bomar and his company seems like the thing to do...but walking there won't be easy. $npcName:11000994$ secretly gives boat rides to $map:2000183$. I should ask him for a favor...

quest.name: The Nightmare
quest.desc: They who followed the ancient Lumieragons and protected the royals: the Moropapa! $npc:11001314$'s granddaughter, $npcName:11001215$, shared that her grandfather has been suffering from a nightmare, where in the depths of Nazkar Temple a giant black dragon appears and the temple crumbles. For $npcName:11001215$, who is shaking with anxiety, let's get into Nazkar Temple and explore $map:02010029$ to see if anything has happened.

quest.name: Dungeon: Secrets of Lubelisk
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:2010055$ (Entrance: $map:02010029$) Party Size (10 players)
$npc:11001483$, hiding by the entrance to $map:02010055$, noted that $npcName:11001215$'s grandfather's nightmare may actually be true. $npc:11001483$ says that if I have the courage, I should into $map:02010055$ and find out what's going on.

quest.name: [Dungeon] Puri's gift.
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001228$ is a who fairy who is collecting havi fruit outside the $map:02000350$! She provides gifts and services for warriors fighting the corruption of the $map:02000350$.
If you manage to make it deep enough inside, she'll give you a gift!

quest.name: 새로운 시멘트 재료
quest.desc: $map:02000017$의 냇가에 모여있는 $npc:21000029$$pp:를,을$ 사냥하여 $item:20000055$$pp:를,을$ 얻자!

quest.name: DIY Cement
quest.desc: Hunt the $npcPlural:21000029$ gathered around the river in $map:02000017$ and acquire $itemPlural:20000055$ to use as building materials!
quest.manual: Hunt the $npcPlural:21000029$ at the river and acquire $itemPlural:20000055$

quest.desc: $map:02000017$의 $npc:11000350$ 옆에 있는 아궁이에서 $item:30000094$$pp:를,을$ 제작하자! 시멘트 제작에 필요한 $item:20000055$$pp:는,은$ $npc:21000029$$pp:를,을$ 사냥하면 또 구할 수 있다고 했으니 재료를 아낄 필요는 없을 것 같다.

quest.name: Handcrafted with Care!
quest.desc: Craft $item:30000094$ at the furnace next to $npc:11000350$ of $map:02000017$! If you don't have the $itemPlural:20000055$ you need to craft it, you can hunt $npcPlural:21000029$. Those things are everywhere, so you don't have to be sparing with the materials!
quest.manual: Get the $itemPlural:020000055$ from $npc:11000350$ and craft the $item:30000094$ in the furnace

quest.name: Puppy Rescue Strategy
quest.desc: Let's rescue $npc:11000355$'s puppy friends from around the meteor in $map:02000014$.

quest.name: 미니핌과의 숨바꼭질
quest.desc: $npc:11000358$$pp:를,을$ 위해 $map:02000110$ 곳곳에 있는 레버를 당겨 숨어있던 $npc:29000023$$pp:를,을$ 잡아 $item:30000097$$pp:를,을$ 가져다 주자.
quest.manual: 매립지 곳곳의 레버를 당겨 $npc:29000023$ 발견 후 $item:30000097$ 구하기

quest.name: Mini Pim Hide-and-Seek
quest.desc: All you need to do is pull all the levers in $map:02000110$, defeat the $npcPlural:29000023$, and deliver the $itemPlural:30000097$ to $npc:11000358$. Why not help a criminal come clean and start a new life?
quest.manual: Pull the levers at $map:02000110$ and retrieve $item:30000097$ from $npc:29000023$

quest.name: Noise Pollution
quest.desc: $npc:11000359$ is really concerned about her son's beauty sleep. You should help them get a little peace and quiet by hunting monsters in $map:02000086$ for $npc:11000359$.

quest.name: Between a Hot and a Cold Place
quest.desc: $npc:11000359$ in $map:02000086$ is really worried about her son. She's asked you to take the ice pack to $npc:11000360$ just for safety's sake. You should be able to find him just to the right of the lava area.

quest.name: 얼음과 용암사이

quest.name: 용암과 얼음의 만남
quest.desc: $map:02000086$의 $npc:11000360$의 집 주변에 있는 용암 구멍을 얼음을 옮겨 막자.

quest.name: Lava, Meet Ice
quest.desc: The only way to save the house and bring the heat down is to block the lava holes. Maybe these ice blocks can cool the lava enough to solve both problems. Put ice in the lava hole near $npc:11000360$'s house in $map:02000086$.
quest.manual: Block the lava hole with ice

quest.name: 용암과 얼음의 만남

quest.name: Crabby Capture
quest.desc: $npc:11000362$ in $map:02000111$ is really excited about cooking a tasty seafood meal. But, he needs lots of crab to do it. Why not help him lure $npcPlural:29000033$ into the traps at the beach?
quest.manual: Lure $npcPlural:29000033$ to the open traps and get $itemPlural:20000056$

quest.desc: $map:02000111$의 $map:02000085$ 포탈 앞 해변에 있는 관광객들에게 $item:30000140$$pp:를,을$ 홍보하자.

quest.name: Word-of-Mouth Advertising
quest.desc: So many people are missing out! Spread the word about $itemPlural:30000140$ and other culinary delights to all the tourists at the beach in front of the portal to $map:02000085$ in $map:02000111$.
quest.manual: Promote $itemPlural:30000140$ to the tourists at the beach

quest.name: Crabby Sabotage
quest.desc: The economy in the area has been totally disrupted by $npc:11000362[gender:0]$'s new venture. Sabotage may not be very nice, but that $npc:11000420$ is definitely someone you don't want to cross. Use tubes to block $npc:11000362$'s $npc:29000033$ traps in $map:02000111$ before she gets mad at you.
quest.manual: Use tubes to block $npc:29000033$ traps on the beach

quest.name: 업무 방해
quest.desc: $map:02000111$에서 튜브를 옮겨 $npc:11000362$의 $npc:29000033$ 함정을 막아버리자.

quest.name: Sticky Fish Fingers
quest.desc: $npc:11000420$ suspects that the $npcPlural:21000101$ in $map:02000111$ city center have stolen the fish her mother was trying to sell. You should help her confront them to find out if they really are the culprits.

quest.name: Making it Big

quest.desc: $npc:11000472$ 뒤에 있는 건물 틈으로 들어가 $npc:29000025$들을 잡아주자.

quest.name: The Itsy-Bitsy Spiders
quest.desc:
$npc:11000472$, who is not the slightest bit afraid of spiders, was about to go and squish all of the $npcPlural:29000025$ infesting the crawl space behind him—that is, until you volunteered.
Well, get to stomping!
quest.manual: Enter the crawl space behind $npc:11000472$ and squish $npcPlural:29000025$

quest.name: Exciting Teleportation
quest.desc: TELI is a strange teleportation machine discovered in $map:02000163$. Why is this machine installed here in the midst of the chaos of other machines and robots?

quest.name: Back to Home
quest.desc: The teleportation device operates as normal. Now it's time to turn it on and get home.

quest.name: Melting Lava
quest.desc: The lava that needs to flow into $map:02000162$'s lava generator has hardened, and therefore the generator is not working. I should follow the path of the lava, locate the problem, and fix it.
quest.manual: Follow the lava, locate the blockage, and fix it

quest.name: 바위 틈을 비집고
quest.desc: $npc:11000599$$pp:는,은$ $map:02000045$의 동굴속에서 신발을 잃어버렸다. $npc:11000599$ 뒤에 보이는 막혀있는 동굴 입구 속으로 들어가, $item:30000180$$pp:를,을$ 구해주자.

quest.name: The Smooshed Shoe
quest.desc: $npcName:11000599$ lost his shoe while spelunking at the $map:02000045$. Enter the cave system behind him and retrieve $item:30000180$.

quest.desc: $npc:11000629$$pp:는,은$ $npc:11000630$$pp:가,이$ 아이들에게 날기 교육을 시키는 방식에 불만이 많다. $npc:11000628$들이 전부 무사히 건넜을리 없으니 $map:02000046$의 하단부에서 날기에 실패한 $npc:11000628$들을 도와주자.

quest.name: Flying Lessons
quest.desc: $npcName:11000629$ is unhappy with how her husband, $npcName:11000630$, is teaching their children how to fly. She may have a point—$npcNamePlural:11000628$ who failed to make it across the $map:02000046$ are littering the canyon floor. Give them a helping hand.

quest.desc: $npc:11000372$의 연구 욕심은 끝이 없다. $map:02000145$에서 찾을 수 있는 $map:02000240$에서 소리의 정체를 파악한 후 증거물을 가져가자. $map:02000240$$pp:는,은$ $npc:11000372$ 아래에 위치해 있다.

quest.name: Things Best Left Buried
quest.desc:
$npc:11000372$ speaks cryptically of a failed experiment, and an abomination that must be destroyed. Travel to $map:02000240$ in the $map:02000145$, destroy the failed experiment, and bring back proof of your deed.
The entrance to the $map:02000240$ is located below $npc:11000372$.
quest.manual: (Elite) Defeat $npc:22090166$ in the $map:02000240$ under the $map:02000145$ and obtain proof of your deed

quest.name: All Fired Up

quest.name: Burn, Burn, Burn!
quest.desc: In a twist that nobody could have predicted, $npc:11000541$ has decided to burn down her whole village rather than let the T'oomba kick them out. Use the $item:30000198$ you gathered to burn down homes at the $map:02000048$.
quest.manual: Use $item:30000198$ to burn homes at the $map:02000048$

quest.name: No Contact
quest.desc: $npc:11000664$ wants to hack $map:02000162$'s antenna in order to see his girlfriend's text message log. Let's hunt the monsters in $map:02000162$ and acquire $item:30000035$ for $npc:11000664$.

quest.name: To Hack, or Not to Hack
quest.desc: Using $item:30000035$, $npc:11000594$ produced $item:30000040$. Let's go to $npc:11000666$ at the upper region of $map:02000162$ and attempt to hack.
quest.complete: Hack $npc:11000666$, located in the upper region of $map:02000162$

quest.name: 울부짖는 석상
quest.desc: 보름달이 뜨는 날의 밤이면, $map:02000051$ 서쪽 꼭대기에 위치한 늑대 석상이 울부짖는다는 소문이 있다. 소문의 주인공인 석상을 살펴보자.
quest.manual: $map:02000051$ 서쪽 꼭대기에 위치한 늑대 석상 조사하기

quest.name: The Howling Stone
quest.desc: Rumor has it that, on a full moon, the wolf statue in northwestern $map:02000051$ howls like a real wolf. You need to see this for yourself.
quest.manual: Watch the wolf statue in northwestern $map:02000051$

quest.name: A Habit of Three...
quest.desc: $npc:11000001$ has been so worried he hasn't been able to sleep ever since a man in black came by looking for $npc:11000502$, his son. Let's go ask $npc:11000101$ in $map:02000083$ about $npc:11000502$'s whereabouts.

quest.name: Big Dreams, Bigger Punishments
quest.desc: $npc:11000502$ is being chased...for it has been revealed that he stole the $item:30000016$ from the Darkstar. I'm going to look for those who robbed $npc:11000502$ at $map:02000141$ and see if I can't find the stolen $item:30000016$.
quest.complete: Find the culprit who stole the $item:30000016$ from $map:02000141$

quest.name: Dungeon: Black Market Den
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:21005001$ (Entrance: $map:2000083$) Party Size (4 players)
$item:30000016$ can only be found in $map:02000241$. If I go down the stairs by the Golden Tower in $map:02000083$, there will be a emergency door that is connected to $map:02000241$! I must keep in mind $npc:11000365$'s advice on gathering comrades and advancing in a group of 4 within $map:02000241$...
quest.manual: Go downstairs from $map:02000241$ and look for $item:30000016$

quest.name: 멈춰버린 멜로디
quest.desc: $npc:11000890$$pp:는,은$ 최근 $map:02000095$에 아름답게 울려퍼지던 멜로디 소리가 들리지 않아 원인을 찾던 중 의심스러운 토템을 발견했다고 한다. 수상한 토템을 제거하여, 정적이 흐르는 $map:02000095$에 아름다운 멜로디를 되찾아주자.

quest.name: Broken Melody
quest.desc: The beautiful music of $map:02000095$ has been silenced, and $npcName:11000890$ thinks that some strange totems are behind it. Remove the totems and restore music to $map:02000095$.
quest.manual: Remove the strange totems in the $map:02000095$

quest.name: 멈춰버린 멜로디
quest.desc: $npc:11000890$$pp:는,은$ 최근 $map:02000095$에 아름답게 울려퍼지던 멜로디 소리가 들리지 않아 원인을 찾던 중 의심스러운 토템을 발견했다고 한다. 수상한 토템을 제거하여, 정적이 흐르는 $map:02000095$에 아름다운 멜로디를 되찾아주자.

quest.name: Chechy's Plan
quest.desc: Now that the totems are gone, $npc:11000890$ wants you to tell her brother, $npc:11000891$. He can be found near the highest point at $map:02000095$.
quest.complete: Talk to $npc:11000891$ at the top of $map:02000095$

quest.name: 도난당한 풀피리
quest.desc: $npc:11000891$$pp:는,은$ 잠들어 버린 요정들을 깨우기 위해 필요한 $item:30000261$$pp:를,을$ 도난 당했다고 한다. $npc:21000065$$pp:를,을$ 사냥하여, 도난당한 $item:30000261$$pp:를,을$ 찾아주자.

quest.name: Flute Felony
quest.desc: $npc:11000891$ says that he needs his $item:30000261$ to awaken the guardians of the fountain. Unfortunately, it was stolen by a $npc:21000065$. Get the $item:30000261$ back.
quest.complete: Talk to $npc:11000891$ at the top of $map:02000095$

quest.name: 음악은 사랑을 싣고
quest.desc: $npc:11000891$$pp:는,은$ 되찾아온 $item:30000261$$pp:를,을$ 연주하면, 멜로디 분수를 깨울 수 있는 세 명의 요정을 불러낼 수 있다고 한다. $item:30000261$$pp:를,을$ 연주하여, 잠들어 있는 세 명의 수호 요정을 깨워보자.

quest.name: An Uplifting Tune
quest.desc: $npc:11000891$ has asked you to awaken the fairfolk guardians of the fountain by playing his $item:30000261$. You might as well give it a try.
quest.manual: Play the $item:30000261$ to summon the guardians
quest.complete: Talk to $npc:11000891$ at the top of $map:02000095$

quest.name: 진정한 파이터라면!
quest.desc: 여행자들을 위한 쉼터이자, 피추피추족의 문화적 특색이 살아있는 $map:02000095$에 위기가 찾아왔다. $map:02000095$$pp:를,을$ 위협하는 몬스터들을 사냥하자!

quest.name: A Call to Action
quest.desc: You found a notice calling for heroes to defend the $map:02000095$ from monsters. Fight for the future of the Picchu Picchu people!
quest.complete: Check the bulletin board in the $map:02000095$

quest.name: 진정한 파이터라면!
quest.desc: 여행자들을 위한 쉼터이자, 피추피추족의 문화적 특색이 살아있는 $map:02000095$에 위기가 찾아왔다. $map:02000095$$pp:를,을$ 위협하는 몬스터들을 사냥하자!

quest.name: 진정한 파이터라면!
quest.desc: 여행자들을 위한 쉼터이자, 피추피추족의 문화적 특색이 살아있는 $map:02000095$에 위기가 찾아왔다. $map:02000095$$pp:를,을$ 위협하는 몬스터들을 사냥하자!

quest.name: 진정한 파이터라면!
quest.desc: 여행자들을 위한 쉼터이자, 피추피추족의 문화적 특색이 살아있는 $map:02000095$에 위기가 찾아왔다. $map:02000095$$pp:를,을$ 위협하는 몬스터들을 사냥하자!

quest.name: Memory Trace
quest.desc: Once upon a time, $npc:11000929$ wrote a great book. But after spending a thousand years in Perion, $npc:11000929$ can't remember the location of the original manuscript. After tracing the ancient memory back, $npc:11000929$ found out the book is inside of an egg. The nest, decorated with multi-colored feathers, is located on the peak of the $map:02000267$. The eggshell has hardened and solidified as time passed, so I'll need to hunt the $npc:21000255$ around the area and use its $item:30000268$ to hatch the egg. Let's go to the $map:02000267$ to find the original manuscript of the book written by $npc:11000929$.
quest.manual: Use the $item:30000268$ to hatch the egg and find the $item:30000265$|Use the $item:30000268$ to hatch the egg and find the $item:30000266$|Use the $item:30000268$ to hatch the egg and find the $item:30000267$

quest.name: Sharing Is Caring
quest.desc: $npc:11000929$ was practically leaping for joy after I managed to locate the original manuscript. $npc:11000929$ claims the book will be a big hit as long as it gets published. If that's the case, I might be able to make a lot of money if I show the manuscript to $npc:11000327$ in $map:02000001$. I should go speak with $npc:11000327$.

quest.name: I'm a Survivor
quest.desc: $npc:11000930$ was deeply hurt and disappointed by the humans when she lost her husband to the poachers. She has been raising her babies by herself in $map:02000267$. It's been difficult for $npc:11000930$ to hunt, as dangerous lava fountains have formed around the area recently. Let's help and bring $item:30000269$ so that she can feed her baby birds.
quest.manual: Hunt the $npc:29000041$ in the bushes and bring it to $npc:11000930$

quest.name: 구슬픈 울음소리
quest.desc: 앞을 볼 수 없지만, 대신 앞 날을 예측하고 바라볼 수 있는 $npc:11000931$. 얼마 전부터 사냥을 떠난 아내 앙카가 계속 꿈에서 나타난다고 한다. 꿈 속에서 본 $map:02000267$의 용암지대로 가서 $item:30000270$$pp:를,을$ 찾은 후에, 양지바른 곳에 있는 제단에서 제사를 올려주자.

quest.name: Mournful Vision
quest.desc:
Although $npc:11000931$ is blind, he has the ability to see visions. He's been having recurring dreams about his mate, Anka, who never returned from her last hunt.
Go to the lava flows of $map:02000267$ and find $item:30000270$, then find a sunny place to lay her to rest.
quest.manual: Find $item:30000270$ in $map:02000267$ and lay her to rest at the altar

quest.name: 구슬픈 울음소리
quest.desc: 앞을 볼 수 없지만, 대신 앞 날을 예측하고 바라볼 수 있는 $npc:11000931$. 얼마 전부터 사냥을 떠난 아내 앙카가 계속 꿈에서 나타난다고 한다. 꿈 속에서 본 $map:02000267$의 용암지대로 가서 $item:30000270$$pp:를,을$ 찾은 후에, 양지바른 곳에 있는 제단에서 제사를 올려주자.

quest.name: 내겐 너무 골치 아픈 너
quest.desc: 오염된 산업폐수가 고여 있는 물길을 커닝시티 발전소의 강한 스파크가 관통하면서 도심 한 복판에 거대한 괴물이 돌아다니는 일이 발생했다. 오염된 거대 돌연변이 $npc:23000013$$pp:는,은$ $map:02000100$ 전체를 병들게 할 지도 모른다. 도심 속에 나타난 $npc:23000013$$pp:를,을$ 처치하자.

quest.name: Life Finds a Way
quest.desc:
A huge monster wanders the city wreaking chaos after industrial waste enters the ecosystem and turns an unsuspecting frog into a thumping freak.
Defeat $npc:23000013$ in $map:02000084$ and put an end to the clomping croaker. It really won't change much in the grand scheme of things, but it sure will make one more day in this city a little more tolerable!

quest.name: 내겐 너무 골치 아픈 너
quest.desc: 오염된 산업폐수가 고여 있는 물길을 커닝시티 발전소의 강한 스파크가 관통하면서 도심 한 복판에 거대한 괴물이 돌아다니는 일이 발생했다. 오염된 거대 돌연변이 $npc:23000013$$pp:는,은$ $map:02000100$ 전체를 병들게 할 지도 모른다. 도심 속에 나타난 $npc:23000013$$pp:를,을$ 처치하자.

quest.name: Dungeon: Catastrophic Jealousy
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:20012001$ (Entrance: $map:02000024$) Party Size (4 players) The quest is only available in Normal mode.
As the fallen angel Ariel spread the seeds of darkness, $npc:23100039$, the violent guard of the underground, became awakened. $npc:23100039$ must be stopped, with it becoming increasingly more violent as it continues to absorb dark spirits. It's time to defeat $npc:23100039$ captured in $map:02000312$.

quest.name: 무소식의 이유
quest.desc: $npc:11000961$$pp:는,은$ $map:02000013$로 파견나간 대원들이 돌아올 때가 한참이 지났는데 아무런 소식도 없이 행방이 묘연해졌다고 말하며 걱정을 하고 있다. $map:02000013$$pp2:로,으로$ 가서 파견나간 자경단원들이 무사한지 행방을 조사해보자.

quest.name: The Long Silence
quest.desc: $npc:11000961$ hasn't heard back from the Green Hoods who were deployed to the $map:02000013$. Head out there and find out what happened to them.
quest.manual: Search for missing Green Hoods at the $map:02000013$

quest.name: 무소식의 이유
quest.desc: $npc:11000961$$pp:는,은$ $map:02000013$로 파견나간 대원들이 돌아올 때가 한참이 지났는데 아무런 소식도 없이 행방이 묘연해졌다고 말하며 걱정을 하고 있다. $map:02000013$$pp2:로,으로$ 가서 파견나간 자경단원들이 무사한지 행방을 조사해보자.

quest.name: 간절했던 손길
quest.desc: 나무 숲 사이로 몸을 숨기고 있는 $npc:11000962$. $npc:11000961$$pp:가,이$ 말한 자경대원 중 한 명인듯 하다. $npc:11000962$$pp:는,은$ 갑작스럽게 무리를 지어 몰려온 몬스터들의 공격에 대응하지 못해 많은 사람들이 부상당했고, 파견 나올때 준비해왔던 구호물품도 모두 바닥이 나서 상황이 매우 좋지 않다고 한다. 가장 시급한 것은 부상당한 사람들을 치료해 주는 것! 홀로 부상자들을 돌보고 있는 $npc:11000832$$pp:를,을$ 찾아가보자.

quest.name: Uphill Battle
quest.desc: You found one of the missing Green Hoods, $npc:11000962$. Her squad was ambushed by monsters and they don't have enough supplies to take care of the wounded. Find $npc:11000832$ and help take care of the injured Green Hoods.

quest.name: 간절했던 손길
quest.desc: 나무 숲 사이로 몸을 숨기고 있는 $npc:11000962$. $npc:11000961$$pp:가,이$ 말한 자경대원 중 한 명인듯 하다. $npc:11000962$$pp:는,은$ 갑작스럽게 무리를 지어 몰려온 몬스터들의 공격에 대응하지 못해 많은 사람들이 부상당했고, 파견 나올때 준비해왔던 구호물품도 모두 바닥이 나서 상황이 매우 좋지 않다고 한다. 가장 시급한 것은 부상당한 사람들을 치료해 주는 것! 홀로 부상자들을 돌보고 있는 $npc:11000832$$pp:를,을$ 찾아가보자.

quest.name: 간절했던 손길
quest.desc: 나무 숲 사이로 몸을 숨기고 있는 $npc:11000962$. $npc:11000961$$pp:가,이$ 말한 자경대원 중 한 명인듯 하다. $npc:11000962$$pp:는,은$ 갑작스럽게 무리를 지어 몰려온 몬스터들의 공격에 대응하지 못해 많은 사람들이 부상당했고, 파견 나올때 준비해왔던 구호물품도 모두 바닥이 나서 상황이 매우 좋지 않다고 한다. 가장 시급한 것은 부상당한 사람들을 치료해 주는 것! 홀로 부상자들을 돌보고 있는 $npc:11000832$$pp:를,을$ 찾아가보자.

quest.name: 간절했던 손길

quest.name: 임시 처방
quest.desc: $npc:11000832$$pp:는,은$ 홀로 부상자들을 돌보느라, 눈코 뜰 새 없이 바쁘다. 갈수록 부상자들은 늘어가는데 이들을 치료 해줄 약이 바닥이 나 버리는 바람에 상황은 더 안 좋기만 하다. 부상당한 환자를 위한 비상약 제조법을 알고 있는 $npc:11000832$$pp:는,은$ 약 제조에 필요한 재료들을 구해달라고 부탁한다. 근처에 있는 $npc:21000353$, $npc:21000003$$pp:를,을$ 사냥하여, $item:30000285$, $item:30000286$$pp:를,을$ 구해오자.

quest.name: Triage
quest.desc: $npcName:11000832$ is swamped taking care of wounded Green Hoods. She needs to make more medicine, and it falls on you to gather the materials. Hunt $npcNamePlural:21000353$ and $npcNamePlural:21000003$ to acquire $itemPlural:30000285$ and $itemPlural:30000286$.

quest.name: 임시 처방

quest.name: 치료가 필요해
quest.desc: $npc:11000963$에 의하면 부상당한 사람들이 치료도 받지 못한 채 거리에 쓰러져 있다고 한다. 안 그래도 치료제가 바닥이 나서 $npc:11000832$$pp:를,을$ 찾아가려고 했지만, 부상자들만 두고 갈 수는 없었다는 $npc:11000963$. $npc:11000963$에게 받은 응급치료제를 가지고, 부상당한 사람들을 치료해주자.

quest.name: Rubbing It In
quest.desc: $npcName:11000963$ gave you some medicine for the injured people below.

quest.name: 치료가 필요해
quest.desc: $npc:11000963$에 의하면 부상당한 사람들이 치료도 받지 못한 채 거리에 쓰러져 있다고 한다. 안 그래도 치료제가 바닥이 나서 $npc:11000832$$pp:를,을$ 찾아가려고 했지만, 부상자들만 두고 갈 수는 없었다는 $npc:11000963$. $npc:11000963$에게 받은 응급치료제를 가지고, 부상당한 사람들을 치료해주자.

quest.name: 사수하라!
quest.desc: $npc:11000972$$pp:는,은$ 급격하게 늘어나버린 몬스터의 공격을 홀로 힘겹게 막아내고 있다. 함께 파견나왔던 자경단원 대부분은 부상을 입었고, 비상 구호물품도 모두 바닥이 나버려서 버틸 수 있는 시간도 얼마 남지 않았다고 한다. 극한 상황에 처해 있음에도 불구하고 포기하지 않겠다고 당차게 말하는 $npc:11000972$. $npc:11000972$$pp:를,을$ 도와 성채를 점령하고 있는 $npc:21000003$, $npc:21000353$, $npc:21000306$$pp:를,을$ 사냥하자.

quest.name: Holding the Fort
quest.desc: $npcName:11000972$ is making a desperate stand against an army of monsters after the rest of her squad was injured and scattered. Alone and without supplies, she refuses to give up—help her by fighting off the hordes of $npcNamePlural:21000003$, $npcNamePlural:21000353$, and $npcNamePlural:21000306$ that are attacking the fortress.
quest.manual: Defeat $npcNamePlural:21000003$ at the $map:02000013$|Defeat $npcNamePlural:21000353$ at the $map:02000013$|Defeat $npcNamePlural:21000306$ at the $map:02000013$

quest.name: 아름답지 않은 소리
quest.desc: $npc:11000741$$pp:는,은$ 새로운 음악 작곡에 한창 몰입 중이다. 밝은 장조의 음악을 만들어야 하는 까닭에 달콤한 향이 가득한 $map:02000186$으로 작업실까지 옮겼지만, 거리의 엉터리 악사들의 소음 때문에 폭발 직전의 상태가 되어버렸다. 창작의 고통으로 예민해질대로 예민해진 $npc:11000741$$pp:를,을$ 위해 $npc:21000278$, $npc:21000173$$pp:를,을$ 사냥하자.

quest.name: Cacophony
quest.desc: $npc:11000741$ has moved to a new studio in the remote $map:02000186$ in order to compose his magnum opus. Unfortunately, the locals are too noisy for him to concentrate. Beat up the $npcPlural:21000278$ and $npcPlural:21000173$ so that $npc:11000741$ can focus on writing real music.

quest.name: 아름답지 않은 소리
quest.desc: $npc:11000741$$pp:는,은$ 새로운 음악 작곡에 한창 몰입 중이다. 밝은 장조의 음악을 만들어야 하는 까닭에 달콤한 향이 가득한 $map:02000186$으로 작업실까지 옮겼지만, 거리의 엉터리 악사들의 소음 때문에 폭발 직전의 상태가 되어버렸다. 창작의 고통으로 예민해질대로 예민해진 $npc:11000741$$pp:를,을$ 위해 $npc:21000278$, $npc:21000173$$pp:를,을$ 사냥하자.

quest.name: 살이 빠지지 않는 이유
quest.desc: 세상에서 자신이 가장 이쁘다고 생각하고 있는 $npc:11000973$! $npc:11000973$$pp:는,은$ 최근 직접 설계한 $item:30000288$ 대로 꾸준한 다이어트를 하고 있는데 살이 빠지지 않아 고민중이다. $npc:11000973$의 살이 빠지지 않는 이유를 알아내기 위해 $npc:11000974$$pp:를,을$ 찾아가보자.

quest.name: Diet Hard
quest.desc: $npcName:11000973$ already knows that she's a beauty, but she wants to lose a little weight before swimsuit season begins! Her diet plan doesn't seem to be working, so drop by $npcName:11000974$ to get some nutrition advice.

quest.name: 살이 빠지지 않는 이유
quest.desc: 세상에서 자신이 가장 이쁘다고 생각하고 있는 $npc:11000973$! $npc:11000973$$pp:는,은$ 최근 직접 설계한 $item:30000288$ 대로 꾸준한 다이어트를 하고 있는데 살이 빠지지 않아 고민중이다. $npc:11000973$의 살이 빠지지 않는 이유를 알아내기 위해 $npc:11000974$$pp:를,을$ 찾아가보자.

quest.name: 다이어트의 적
quest.desc: $item:30000288$$pp:를,을$ 보고 소스라치게 놀라는 $npc:11000974$. 일반 성인들도 하루에 이렇게 고열량 음식을, 그것도 많이 섭취하기는 힘들다고 한다. $npc:11000974$$pp:는,은$ $npc:11000973$의 잘못된 식습관과 다이어트 방법을 바로 잡아주기 위해 새로운 다이어트 음식을 만들어 주겠다고 한다. $map:02000186$ 곳곳에 있는 $item:30000289$, $item:30000290$, $item:30000291$$pp:를,을$ 구해오자.
quest.manual: $npc:21000160$$pp:를,을$ 사냥하여 $item:30000289$ 구하기|황금색 사과나무에서 $item:30000290$ 따기|$map:02000186$ 곳곳에 있는 $item:30000291$ 찾아오기

quest.name: A Tasty Weight Loss Treat
quest.desc: $npcName:11000974$ is horrified by $item:30000288$. She's going to work on some new dishes to help $npcName:11000973$ reach her weight loss goal. Gather some $itemPlural:30000289$, $itemPlural:30000290$, and $itemPlural:30000291$ from the $map:02000186$ for her.
quest.manual: Hunt $npcNamePlural:21000160$ for $itemPlural:30000289$|Pick $itemPlural:30000290$ from golden apple trees|Collect $itemPlural:30000291$ in the $map:02000186$

quest.name: 다이어트의 적
quest.desc: $item:30000288$$pp:를,을$ 보고 소스라치게 놀라는 $npc:11000974$. 일반 성인들도 하루에 이렇게 고열량 음식을, 그것도 많이 섭취하기는 힘들다고 한다. $npc:11000974$$pp:는,은$ $npc:11000973$의 잘못된 식습관과 다이어트 방법을 바로 잡아주기 위해 새로운 다이어트 음식을 만들어 주겠다고 한다. $map:02000186$ 곳곳에 있는 $item:30000289$, $item:30000290$, $item:30000291$$pp:를,을$ 구해오자.
quest.manual: $npc:21000160$$pp:를,을$ 사냥하여 $item:30000289$ 구하기|황금색 사과나무에서 $item:30000290$ 따기|$map:02000186$ 곳곳에 있는 $item:30000291$ 찾아오기

quest.name: Getting in Shape
quest.desc: $item:30000292$ is all packed, just for $npcName:11000973$! Deliver it to her before it gets cold.

quest.name: 뜨거운 수행
quest.desc: 아무도 그에 대한 정체를 알 수가 없다! 자신을 '무림의 최강'이라 자처하는 $npc:11000976$!! 생김새는 그럴 듯하나, 어찌 얘기를 하면 할수록 어딘가 텅텅… $npc:11000976$$pp:는,은$ 무림 최강 중의 최강을 가리는 대전에서 우승하기 위해 $item:30000294$$pp:를,을$ 구해가야 하는데, 부상을 입어 도저히 갈 수 없다고 말한다. 겉은 너무 멀쩡해 보이는 $npc:11000976$. 속는 셈치고, $map:02000096$의 용암지대에서만 자라는 $item:30000294$$pp:를,을$ 구해오자!

quest.name: Scorching Skill
quest.desc:
$npcName:11000976$ claims to be one of the world's greatest martial artists. He looks the part, but the more you talk with him, the less convincing he is.
He's asked you to gather some $itemPlural:30000294$ so that he can participate in an important tournament. He seems harmless enough, so you might as well do it.

quest.name: 신이 내린 벌
quest.desc: 쿤쿤부족 제사장 $npcName:11000977$$pp:는,은$ 대지의 신께 올릴 777일간의 기도제를 준비하느라, 분주하게 움직이고 있다. $npc:11000977$$pp:가,이$ 무사히 신께 제를 올릴 수 있도록, 필요한 제수용품을 가져다주자!

quest.name: An Angry God
quest.desc: $npcName:11000977$ is preparing for 777 days of prayer to the god of his people. Bring the items he needs to safely perform the ritual.

quest.name: 집결! 쿤쿤부족
quest.desc: $npc:11000977$$pp:는,은$ 기도제에 올릴 모든 제수용품은 준비가 되었으니, 함께 기도제를 지낼 쿤쿤부족 주술사들을 깨워야한다고 말한다. 777일동안의 기도를 지낸 후에, 777일 동안 깊은 잠에 빠져 있는 쿤쿤부족 주술사들을 깨우자.
quest.manual: 천막에서 깊은 잠에 빠져 있는 쿤쿤부족 주술사 깨우기

quest.name: Wake-up Call
quest.desc: Now that $npcName:11000977$'s ritual is almost ready, it's time to awaken the kunkun shamans.

quest.name: 집결! 쿤쿤부족
quest.desc: $npc:11000977$$pp:는,은$ 기도제에 올릴 모든 제수용품은 준비가 되었으니, 함께 기도제를 지낼 쿤쿤부족 주술사들을 깨워야한다고 말한다. 777일동안의 기도를 지낸 후에, 777일 동안 깊은 잠에 빠져 있는 쿤쿤부족 주술사들을 깨우자.

quest.name: 마음은 청춘이라오
quest.desc: $npc:11000744$$pp:는,은$ 동화 속 숲속 마을에서 소원을 들어준다고 하는 소원의 스프를 만들어 주던 숲속의 마녀다. 오랜 시간 스프를 졸이는데 몰입한 $npc:11000744$$pp:는,은$ 당이 떨어져서 달콤한 음식을 상상하면서 스프의 간을 보다가 그만 $map:02000185$에 오게 되었다고 한다. 하지만, $npc:11000744$$pp:는,은$ 지금 자신이 어디서 무엇을 했었는지 중요하지 않다! 달콤한 냄새를 따라 $npc:11000744$의 당을 보충 해줄수 있는 달콤한 음식을 구해다 주자!

quest.name: Back in Time
quest.desc: $npc:11000984$ from the Andersen Village arrived in $map:02000185$ after messing up the incantation which resulted in the wrong door of time opening. In order to open the door that leads to the town of fairy tales, $npc:11000984$ needs $item:30000301$, which was taken by $npc:21000278$. It's time to hunt $npc:21000278$ and take the $item:30000301$ back.

quest.name: A Bold Move
quest.desc: $npc:11000984$ is ready to go back to the Andersen Village, but $npc:11000984$'s friends morphed into violent monsters after warping through the distortion of time and space. $npc:11000984$ feels responsible for this turn of events, and doesn't want to go back without fixing this. For the safety of the Andersen Village and $map:02000185$, let's defeat $npc:21000278$, $npc:21000173$, and $npc:21000160$.

quest.name: 오리무중 연구
quest.desc: $map:02000023$의 $npc:11000985$$pp:는,은$ 오랜 시간 인공지능 로봇에 대한 연구를 해왔다. 얼마 전 드디어 기나긴 연구의 끝을 알리는 인공지능 로봇 $npc:21000241$가 탄생하였지만, 결과는 그야말로 참담하기만 했다. $map:02000023$$pp:를,을$ 정화시키고 관리할 목적으로 만들었던 $npc:21000241$가 숲을 파괴하고 있는 것이다. 프로그램이 어디서부터 오류를 냈는지 알 수는 없지만, 지금 당장은 $npc:21000241$ 파괴가 시급하다. 잘못 설계된 로봇 $npc:21000241$$pp:를,을$ 파괴시키자.

quest.name: Haywire
quest.desc:
$npc:11000985$ has spent much of his career developing robots to help take care of the forests of $map:02000023$. However, his precious creations have gone haywire and are now laying waste to the very woods he sought to protect.
Now you must destroy the $npcPlural:21000241$ and figure out what went wrong.

quest.desc: $map:02000023$의 $npc:11000985$$pp:는,은$ 오랜 시간 인공지능 로봇에 대한 연구를 해왔다. 얼마 전 드디어 기나긴 연구의 끝을 알리는 인공지능 로봇 $npc:21000241$가 탄생하였지만, 결과는 그야말로 참담하기만 했다. $map:02000023$$pp:를,을$ 정화시키고 관리할 목적으로 만들었던 $npc:21000241$가 숲을 파괴하고 있는 것이다. 프로그램이 어디서부터 오류를 냈는지 알 수는 없지만, 지금 당장은 $npc:21000241$ 파괴가 시급하다. 잘못 설계된 로봇 $npc:21000241$$pp:를,을$ 파괴시키자.

quest.name: 포기란 없다
quest.desc: $npc:11000985$$pp:는,은$ 평생을 바쳐 연구해온 $npc:21000241$$pp:를,을$ 이대로 포기할 수는 없다고 한다. 무슨 일이 있어도 잘못된 오류의 원인을 찾고, 모든걸 바로잡아 놓겠다는 $npc:11000985$. 당분간 연구소로 다시 복귀해 오류 데이터를 분석해야 하니, 임시 연구소에 설치해둔 중앙 처리 장치의 데이터를 복사해서 가져다 달라고 부탁한다. $map:02000128$에 있는 $npcName:11000985$ 연구실에서 $npc:11000985$$pp:가,이$ 건네준 $item:30000302$$pp:를,을$ 중앙 처리 장치에 넣어, 그동안의 모든 데이터를 복사해오자.

quest.name: Iteration
quest.desc:
$npc:11000985$ refuses to give up just because his $npcPlural:21000241$ went berserk. He plans to carefully analyze the error that led to all this, but he needs the data from his computer if he's going to do so.
Go to his computer at the $map:02000128$ and copy the data onto the $item:30000302$ he gave you.
quest.manual: Copy the data from $npcName:11000985$'s lab at the $map:02000128$

quest.name: 포기란 없다

quest.name: 잃어버린 탄생석
quest.desc:
$npc:11000986$$pp:는,은$ 하늘나라로 간 아빠가 물려준 자신의 보물 1호인 탄생 원석을 잃어버려 슬퍼하고 있다.
힘들 때 힘이 되어준 친구들을 위해 탄생석을 세공하여 목걸이를 선물하려 했지만, 반짝이는 빛을 보고 근처의 몬스터들이 달려들어 빛나는 원석을 집어 삼켜 버렸다.
$map:02000128$에 서식하는 $npc:21000052$, $npc:21000004$으로부터 도난당한 $npc:11000986$의 소중한 탄생 원석을 되찾아오자.

quest.name: The Lost Stones
quest.desc:
$npc:11000986$ is upset that her birthstones—gifts left behind for her by her father—were stolen by monsters. She needs those gemstones to make a gift for her friends, who got her through some difficult times.
Reclaim the gemstones from the $npcPlural:21000052$ and $npcPlural:21000004$ living in $map:02000128$.

quest.name: 잃어버린 탄생석
quest.desc:
$npc:11000986$$pp:는,은$ 하늘나라로 간 아빠가 물려준 자신의 보물 1호인 탄생 원석을 잃어버려 슬퍼하고 있다.

quest.name: 내 친구를 소개합니다
quest.desc: 잃어버린 탄생 원석을 찾은 $npc:11000986$$pp:는,은$ 감사의 뜻으로 자신에게 둘도 없는 은인이자 형제이기도 한 소중한 친구들을 소개해 주겠다고 한다. 그들은 엘리니아에서 잊혀진 보로보로 난쟁이들! 과연 보로보로들이 어떤 사연으로, 어디에서, 어떻게 살고 있는지 그들만의 세상으로 찾아가보자! $map:02000128$ 꼭대기에 있는 $map:02000197$$pp:는,은$ 과연 어떤 곳일까?

quest.name: Secret Friends
quest.desc:
To thank you for retrieving her birthstones, $npc:11000986$ wants to introduce you to her very special friends. They're the boroboro, the forgotten fairfolk dwarves of Ellinia!
$map:02000197$ is at the top of the $map:02000128$. What kind of place could it be?
quest.manual: Enter $map:02000197$ through the top of the $map:02000128$

quest.name: 내 친구를 소개합니다
quest.desc: 잃어버린 탄생 원석을 찾은 $npc:11000986$$pp:는,은$ 감사의 뜻으로 자신에게 둘도 없는 은인이자 형제이기도 한 소중한 친구들을 소개해 주겠다고 한다. 그들은 엘리니아에서 잊혀진 보로보로 난쟁이들! 과연 보로보로들이 어떤 사연으로, 어디에서, 어떻게 살고 있는지 그들만의 세상으로 찾아가보자! $map:02000128$ 꼭대기에 있는 $map:02000197$$pp:는,은$ 과연 어떤 곳일까?

quest.name: 작지만 바쁜 시간
quest.desc: $map:02000197$에서 만난 보로보로 할아버지 $npcName:11000987$. $npc:11000986$의 안부를 전해 듣자 경계심을 금방 푸는듯 하다. $npcName:11000987$$pp:는,은$ 아직은 말해줄 수 없는 보로보로 난쟁이들의 사연에 대해 잠시 고민을 하다가, 이내 중요한 시기에 평화롭게 낮잠이나 자고 있는 보로보로들이 문득 생각난다. $npcName:11000987$의 부탁대로, 낮잠을 자고 있는 보로보로들을 깨워보자.

quest.name: Moving Day
quest.desc: $npcName:11000987$, the boroboro elder in $map:02000197$, is upset that his fellow dwarves are being lazy bums during such a critical time. Help wake them up from their naps.
quest.manual: Wake up the boroboro dwarves in $map:02000197$

quest.name: 작지만 바쁜 시간
quest.desc: $map:02000197$에서 만난 보로보로 할아버지 $npcName:11000987$. $npc:11000986$의 안부를 전해 듣자 경계심을 금방 푸는듯 하다. $npcName:11000987$$pp:는,은$ 아직은 말해줄 수 없는 보로보로 난쟁이들의 사연에 대해 잠시 고민을 하다가, 이내 중요한 시기에 평화롭게 낮잠이나 자고 있는 보로보로들이 문득 생각난다. $npcName:11000987$의 부탁대로, 낮잠을 자고 있는 보로보로들을 깨워보자.

quest.name: 감시탑의 불청객
quest.desc: $npc:11000959$$pp:는,은$ $map:02000091$을 홀로 지키며, 외로운 싸움을 하고 있다. 체력도 체력이지만 이제는 정신적으로도 많이 약해져버린 $npc:11000959$$pp:는,은$ 더 이상은 버틸 힘이 없다며 도움을 청해온다. $npc:11000959$$pp:를,을$ 도와 감시탑을 위협하고 있는 $npc:21000265$, $npc:21000306$$pp:를,을$ 소탕하자.

quest.name: The Lone Patrolman
quest.desc: $npc:11000959$ is guarding the $map:02000091$ alone. Pushed to his absolute limit, he can't hold the tower much longer without some help. Hold off the $npcNamePlural:21000265$ and $npcNamePlural:21000306$ while he fortifies his position.

quest.name: 감시탑의 불청객
quest.desc: $npc:11000959$$pp:는,은$ $map:02000091$을 홀로 지키며, 외로운 싸움을 하고 있다. 체력도 체력이지만 이제는 정신적으로도 많이 약해져버린 $npc:11000959$$pp:는,은$ 더 이상은 버틸 힘이 없다며 도움을 청해온다. $npc:11000959$$pp:를,을$ 도와 감시탑을 위협하고 있는 $npc:21000265$, $npc:21000306$$pp:를,을$ 소탕하자.

quest.name: 감시탑의 불청객
quest.desc: $npc:11000959$$pp:는,은$ $map:02000091$을 홀로 지키며, 외로운 싸움을 하고 있다. 체력도 체력이지만 이제는 정신적으로도 많이 약해져버린 $npc:11000959$$pp:는,은$ 더 이상은 버틸 힘이 없다며 도움을 청해온다. $npc:11000959$$pp:를,을$ 도와 감시탑을 위협하고 있는 $npc:21000265$, $npc:21000306$$pp:를,을$ 소탕하자.

quest.name: 감시탑의 불청객
quest.desc: $npc:11000959$$pp:는,은$ $map:02000091$을 홀로 지키며, 외로운 싸움을 하고 있다. 체력도 체력이지만 이제는 정신적으로도 많이 약해져버린 $npc:11000959$$pp:는,은$ 더 이상은 버틸 힘이 없다며 도움을 청해온다. $npc:11000959$$pp:를,을$ 도와 감시탑을 위협하고 있는 $npc:21000265$, $npc:21000306$$pp:를,을$ 소탕하자.

quest.name: S.O.S
quest.desc: 다행히 감시탑 입구까지 몰려와 위협을 가하던 몬스터들의 수는 많이 줄어 들었다. 하지만 $npc:11000959$$pp:는,은$ 또 언제고 들이닥칠 수 있는 위협이기 때문에 이대로 마음을 놓고 있을 순 없다고 한다. 위협받고 있는 $map:02000091$을 지키기 위해 추가 병력 요청이 필요한 상황이다. $map:02000091$ 성벽에 있는 전서구를 날려 본부에 있는 대원들에게 지원을 요청하자.

quest.name: Call for Relief
quest.desc:
Fortunately, the majority of the monsters threatening the watchtower at the entrance have been defeated. Unfortunately, it's still too early to let your guard down because $npc:11000959$ can't hold off an attack on his own. The $map:02000091$ needs reinforcements.
Send a carrier pigeon from the $map:02000091$ to request reinforcements from headquarters.
quest.manual: Send a carrier pigeon to ask for reinforcements

quest.name: S.O.S
quest.desc: 다행히 감시탑 입구까지 몰려와 위협을 가하던 몬스터들의 수는 많이 줄어 들었다. 하지만 $npc:11000959$$pp:는,은$ 또 언제고 들이닥칠 수 있는 위협이기 때문에 이대로 마음을 놓고 있을 순 없다고 한다. 위협받고 있는 $map:02000091$을 지키기 위해 추가 병력 요청이 필요한 상황이다. $map:02000091$ 성벽에 있는 전서구를 날려 본부에 있는 대원들에게 지원을 요청하자.

quest.name: S.O.S
quest.desc: 다행히 감시탑 입구까지 몰려와 위협을 가하던 몬스터들의 수는 많이 줄어 들었다. 하지만 $npc:11000959$$pp:는,은$ 또 언제고 들이닥칠 수 있는 위협이기 때문에 이대로 마음을 놓고 있을 순 없다고 한다. 위협받고 있는 $map:02000091$을 지키기 위해 추가 병력 요청이 필요한 상황이다. $map:02000091$ 성벽에 있는 전서구를 날려 본부에 있는 대원들에게 지원을 요청하자.

quest.name: S.O.S
quest.desc: 다행히 감시탑 입구까지 몰려와 위협을 가하던 몬스터들의 수는 많이 줄어 들었다. 하지만 $npc:11000959$$pp:는,은$ 또 언제고 들이닥칠 수 있는 위협이기 때문에 이대로 마음을 놓고 있을 순 없다고 한다. 위협받고 있는 $map:02000091$을 지키기 위해 추가 병력 요청이 필요한 상황이다. $map:02000091$ 성벽에 있는 전서구를 날려 본부에 있는 대원들에게 지원을 요청하자.

quest.name: My Precious Chickens
quest.desc: Will be added
quest.manual: Safely put the premium chickens grazing in the field to the poultry farm

quest.name: Sticky Situation
quest.desc: From the corner of $map:02000196$ in $map:02000091$, a girl screams in horror. She says her name is $npc:11000960$, and the reason she let out such a bloodcurdling scream...is because toilet paper is nowhere to be found. ...It looks like she didn't check if there was any $item:30000313$ before taking care of business. Let's show some sympathy and go through the emergency aid box to find $item:30000313$ for $npc:11000960$, who is in quite a sticky situation.
quest.manual: Go through the emergency aid box to find $item:30000313$

quest.name: First Contact
quest.desc: You place the $item:30000313$ through the crack in the door, but $npc:11000960$ lets out another ear-piercing scream as soon as you turn around. It turns out she can't reach the $item:30000313$ from where she is sitting... At the end of her rope, $npc:11000960$ asks you to come in to the $map:02000196$... Could this situation get any worse...

quest.name: Battle for Bowels
quest.desc: $npc:11000960$ confesses that she is currently suffering from...ahem...chronic constipation. She claims that consuming the $npc:21000353$ extract will relieve her from this painful condition. Let's hunt $npc:21000353$ to relieve $npc:11000960$ from such a painful condition.

quest.name: 이미 엎질러진 물
quest.desc: 외모에 대한 콤플렉스를 가지고 있는 로로는 세계수 씨앗을 가지고 오면 외모를 바꿀 수 있는 묘약을 만들어 줄 수 있다는 $npc:11000746$의 농담을 진지하게 받아들인다. 혼자의 힘으로는 절대로 얻을 수 없는 세계수 씨앗을 갖기 위해, 숲속의 거인인 무무스에게 세뇌의 가면을 씌워 $map:02000103$$pp:를,을$ 쑥대밭으로 만들고 있는 로로. 점점 난폭해지는 $npc:23000035$$pp:를,을$ 제압하지 않으면 $map:02000023$의 심장부와도 같은 세계수 씨앗을 정말로 빼앗길지도 모른다. $npc:23000035$$pp:를,을$ 제압하고 무무스가 쓰고 있는 $item:30000329$$pp:를,을$ 가져오자.

quest.name: Undoing the Damage
quest.desc:
$npcName:11000746$ jokingly said that Lo could make himself more handsome if he had a seed from the $map:02000023$. She didn't expect him to actually try to take it! To make matters worse, he's placed an enchanted mask on Moomoo, turning the giant into his thrall.
Now it's up to you to take down $npc:23000035$ and get that $item:30000329$ back.

quest.name: 이미 엎질러진 물
quest.desc: 외모에 대한 콤플렉스를 가지고 있는 로로는 세계수 씨앗을 가지고 오면 외모를 바꿀 수 있는 묘약을 만들어 줄 수 있다는 $npc:11000746$의 농담을 진지하게 받아들인다. 혼자의 힘으로는 절대로 얻을 수 없는 세계수 씨앗을 갖기 위해, 숲속의 거인인 무무스에게 세뇌의 가면을 씌워 $map:02000103$$pp:를,을$ 쑥대밭으로 만들고 있는 로로. 점점 난폭해지는 $npc:23000035$$pp:를,을$ 제압하지 않으면 $map:02000023$의 심장부와도 같은 세계수 씨앗을 정말로 빼앗길지도 모른다. $npc:23000035$$pp:를,을$ 제압하고 무무스가 쓰고 있는 $item:30000329$$pp:를,을$ 가져오자.

quest.desc: 외모에 대한 콤플렉스를 가지고 있는 로로는 세계수 씨앗을 가지고 오면 외모를 바꿀 수 있는 묘약을 만들어 줄 수 있다는 $npc:11000746$의 농담을 진지하게 받아들인다. 혼자의 힘으로는 절대로 얻을 수 없는 세계수 씨앗을 갖기 위해, 숲속의 거인인 무무스에게 세뇌의 가면을 씌워 $map:02000103$$pp:를,을$ 쑥대밭으로 만들고 있는 로로. 점점 난폭해지는 $npc:23000035$$pp:를,을$ 제압하지 않으면 $map:02000023$의 심장부와도 같은 세계수 씨앗을 정말로 빼앗길지도 모른다. $npc:23000035$$pp:를,을$ 제압하고 무무스가 쓰고 있는 $item:30000329$$pp:를,을$ 가져오자.

quest.name: 이미 엎질러진 물
quest.desc: 외모에 대한 콤플렉스를 가지고 있는 로로는 세계수 씨앗을 가지고 오면 외모를 바꿀 수 있는 묘약을 만들어 줄 수 있다는 $npc:11000746$의 농담을 진지하게 받아들인다. 혼자의 힘으로는 절대로 얻을 수 없는 세계수 씨앗을 갖기 위해, 숲속의 거인인 무무스에게 세뇌의 가면을 씌워 $map:02000103$$pp:를,을$ 쑥대밭으로 만들고 있는 로로. 점점 난폭해지는 $npc:23000035$$pp:를,을$ 제압하지 않으면 $map:02000023$의 심장부와도 같은 세계수 씨앗을 정말로 빼앗길지도 모른다. $npc:23000035$$pp:를,을$ 제압하고 무무스가 쓰고 있는 $item:30000329$$pp:를,을$ 가져오자.

quest.name: 불길한 물방울
quest.desc: 숲의 요정 $npc:11000876$$pp:는,은$ 머리를 식히기 위해 빨간 점박이 무당벌레의 노래를 들으러 $map:02000215$에 갔다가 끔찍한 것을 보고야 말았다. 숲에 떠다니는 불길한 느낌의 보랏빛 물방울과, 더 끔찍한 것은 숲의 친구 빨간 점박이 무당벌레가 불길한 물방울에 오염되어 보랏빛으로 변해버린 것이다. $npc:11000876$$pp:는,은$ 이대로 가다가는 $map:02000215$ 전체가 병들어 버리고 말 거라며, 숲을 오염시키고 있는 도마구리를 처치해 달라고 한다. $map:02000215$에서 $npc:21090176$, $npc:21090177$, $npc:21090175$$pp:를,을$ 사냥하자.

quest.name: Song of the Ladybugs
quest.desc:
$npcName:11000876$ went to $map:02000215$ to listen to the ladybugs sing, but it seems that something has made the ladybugs horribly sick. $npcName:11000876$ thinks that the $npcPlural:21090176$, $npcPlural:21090177$, and $npcPlural:21090175$ are behind this trouble.
You know what to do.

quest.name: 불길한 물방울
quest.desc: 숲의 요정 $npc:11000876$$pp:는,은$ 머리를 식히기 위해 빨간 점박이 무당벌레의 노래를 들으러 $map:02000215$에 갔다가 끔찍한 것을 보고야 말았다. 숲에 떠다니는 불길한 느낌의 보랏빛 물방울과, 더 끔찍한 것은 숲의 친구 빨간 점박이 무당벌레가 불길한 물방울에 오염되어 보랏빛으로 변해버린 것이다. $npc:11000876$$pp:는,은$ 이대로 가다가는 $map:02000215$ 전체가 병들어 버리고 말 거라며, 숲을 오염시키고 있는 도마구리를 처치해 달라고 한다. $map:02000215$에서 $npc:21090176$, $npc:21090177$, $npc:21090175$$pp:를,을$ 사냥하자.

quest.name: 불길한 물방울
